description.p: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 35-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that arenâ€™t being worn or carried.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.
